subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jeanne Moutoussamy-Ashe, Arthur Ashe’s widow, has come to think of him as a Bodhisattva, dedicated to the ultimate welfare of other beings.
snippet: Jeanne Moutoussamy-Ashe, Arthur Ashe’s widow, has come to think of him as a Bodhisattva, dedicated to the ultimate welfare of other beings.
